If you are reading this, everything works as expected! Contact us at help@snov.io if you have any questions, we’re always here to help.


Happy sending,

Hi,

we do sell for 100 Euros (no expiry). As soon you send post we can put it live in 24h All kind of links on it, everything except drugs or adult explicit content

 You can check a sample guest post here: https://www.tvtuga.com/mostbet-casino-regulacao-legalidade/

 Payment by paypal, skrill or paxum

 

 

Best,

 

TVTUGA
www.tvtuga.com <http://www.tvtuga.com/> 

 

De: Manager Nightlightmedia [mailto:manager@nightlitemedia.com] 
Enviada: quarta-feira, 28 de maio de 2025 05:45
Para: tvtuga@gmail.com
Assunto: Interested in Monetizing Your Website? Let’s Discuss!

 

My name is Mark, and I work with an SEO agency that helps clients improve their website visibility. We'd like to propose a mutually beneficial partnership for your site.   

We kindly ask you to clarify the following points: 
    Is it possible to place such content on your platform?   

    What would be the cost per article (regular or casino-themed)?   

    Are gambling-related topics allowed?   

    Do you have other websites where we could collaborate?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon! 

Best regards, Mark



Mark 


LinkBuilding Manager  


Nightlitemedia.com


  <mailto:manager@nightlitemedia.com> manager@nightlitemedia.com


  <tel:+1%20(888)%20418-3839> +1 (888) 418-3839

Hello! ​﻿ ﻿Please send your request with the conditions and prices to partner@propellerads.com ﻿Our responsible team will contact you in case your suggestion seems interesting. 
 
 Best regards, 
 AdHelpTeam

Hi,



Yes, we publish guest/sponsored posts if they are quality and in the format of our blog.



And we have the following rates:



If you provide us a guest post - publishing costs $200

If you order us a sponsored post - writing and publishing cost $300



The post will include 1 do-follow link. Post and link in it will be lifetime.



We publish articles only after the payment.



We do not publish every article. Topic, title and a content have to be reviewed by us before writing.



Have to say one more time that this article must correspond to the format of our website. We do not work with CBD, gambling, casino, adult, dating, loans, essay, crypto, trading etc. sites.



--

Best Regards,

Jessica Karter

www.BeautifulLife.info

We publish articles on the topic of gambling.

You can put up to two links in it and a 900x600 pix-jpg photo

The price is 220 BGN excluding VAT, one-time payment.

I will wait for your answer.

Have a nice day!

Hristiana
